channel.title: Need help with hosting my server please!
channel.description:
I dont get it it doesnt work?
2: i can play on my server that good ;D 3: I putted exceptions one is (1smtps1 port: 43594 tcp) and other one is (1smtps1 port: 43594 udp) 4: I got no ip and downloaded it looks like this [img]http://img112.imageshack.us/img112/4761/1gpsmyserverom1.png[/img]
5: and i portforwarded it looks like this [img]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/6666/2gpsmyserverqb6.png[/img] 6: and my server is running cause i can play it but not with the ip to let others play.

item.title: Need help with hosting my server please!
item.dc:creator: @jackal313 jackal313
item.description:
@jackal313 wrote:

the fisrt thing i had to do was assign my computer a static ip adress. then i had to set no-ip to update to that ip adress and then u had to portforward

Read full topic
